InstalledItem.Name: PC2 Dual S4 Mount
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] PC2 Dual S4 Mount

InstalledItem.Name: C-788 Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 4

Hurtling high caliber rounds with devastating velocity, Behring’s C-788 Ballistic Autocannon was built to punch through ship armor. Extremely durable with exceptional heat resistance, the “Combine” can handle a heavy workload that, even with the weapon’s slower rate of fire, makes it an ideal choice for taking on larger, less maneuverable targets.

InstalledItem.Name: Revenant Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 4

If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. And if you want it broke, aim a Revenant at it. Solidly built on a foundation of centuries-old tech, Apocalypse Arms puts an innovative spin on battle-tested designs to create a rugged ballistic Gatling that can steadily hurtle death across the void. Though it’s slow to spin up and cool down, the Revenant’s dependability makes it a favorite for those expecting to find trouble.

InstalledItem.Name: Revenant Gatling

InstalledItem.Name: Predator Scattergun
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Scattergun
Size: 3

The Predator scattergun preys upon nearby opponents with an overwhelming barrage of ballistic ammo. The size three version of Apocalypse Arms' feared scattergun trades effective range for a wide spread.

InstalledItem.Name: Stronghold
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Stronghold shield generator uses patented hull plating techniques to reinforce the generator’s body to make it one of the sturdiest on the market. That means the shield and component are both built to last.

InstalledItem.Name: Ginzel
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The unique name for this stalwart industrial power plant was inspired by the nickname of a Juno Starwerk junior engineer who helped design it.

InstalledItem.Name: ThermalCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

When you’re in the middle of an important job, you don’t want to waste time wondering if your cooler is doing its part. Now you don’t have to. With the dependable mid-level ThermalCore cooler from Juno Starwerk onboard, you can take all the guesswork out of heat management.

InstalledItem.Name: ThermalCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3

InstalledItem.Name: Kama
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Kama from Juno Starwerk has won more “Fan Favorite” reader’s poll from ‘Long Haul Quarterly’ than any other industrial quantum drive in its class.

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.
